predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, CISA will add at least 15 CVEs to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count new CVE entries added to CISA's KEV catalog between 2025-11-13 and 2025-11-30 (UTC) using the official JSON/CSV feeds; total added >= 15.
monitoring_signals: CISA KEV RSS/JSON feed diffs
Emergency Directive or AA notifications referencing active exploitation
Ransomware and 0-day exploitation reports from major vendors (Rapid7, Microsoft, Google TAG)
predictions.rationale: Active exploitation pace remains elevated; agencies often batch-add CVEs ahead of holidays.

predictions.text: The AAA national average regular gasoline price will print at or below $3.10 per gallon on at least one U.S. reporting date by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: AAA’s daily national average (regular) displayed on gasprices.aaa.com shows $3.10 or lower on any date through 2025-11-30 (U.S. Eastern time). Screenshot or archived page suffices.
monitoring_signals: NY Harbor RBOB front-month futures trend
EIA weekly gasoline inventory builds and demand (product supplied)
Seasonal refinery utilization and crack spread changes
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand softness, lower RBOB, and adequate inventories should pressure retail prices.

predictions.text: U.S. Retail Sales (headline, MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between -0.4% and +0.2% in the advance report.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the headline month-over-month percent change in the Census Bureau's Advance Monthly Retail Trade Report (table 1) for Oct 2025; value must be within [-0.4%, +0.2%].
evidence: https://www.eia.gov/petroleum/gasdiesel/ (gas price drag on nominal sales)
monitoring_signals: High-frequency card-spend trackers (BAC, JPM, Affinity)
Auto sales unit results and dealer incentives
Gasoline prices' month-average vs September
predictions.rationale: Lower gas prices and softer goods demand likely weigh on nominal headline sales.

predictions.text: U.S. PPI Final Demand (MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between -0.2% and +0.2% in the BLS release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the Bureau of Labor Statistics PPI news release table for Final Demand MoM SA for Oct 2025; outcome must be within [-0.2%, +0.2%].
monitoring_signals: ISM prices paid components
Energy inputs (WTI/RBOB) month-over-month changes
Freight rates and supplier delivery times
predictions.rationale: Input cost pressures look contained; energy and core goods disinflation temper PPI.

predictions.text: At least three FAA-licensed U.S. commercial orbital launches will occur between 2025-11-21 00:00 UTC and 2025-12-05 23:59 UTC.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count FAA-licensed orbital launches (e.g., SpaceX, ULA, Rocket Lab from U.S. sites) within the window using FAA/AST licenses and launch logs (NextSpaceflight, Spaceflight Now). Total must be >=3.
monitoring_signals: Mission static fire tests and Notices to Airmen (NOTAMs)/mariners
Weather forecasts at Cape Canaveral, Vandenberg, and Wallops
Range availability and TFR postings
predictions.rationale: Manifest density and typical late-year cadence make three or more launches likely in that span.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will add at least one person or entity to the SDN List under the CYBER program.
predictions.verification_criteria: A U.S. Treasury press release and SDN List update explicitly citing the CYBER program tag; at least one new designation dated on or before 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: US-CERT and FBI advisories linking state-backed or major criminal cyber activity
Coordinated advisories with UK/NCSC, EU, or Five Eyes
High-impact ransomware events with U.S. nexus
predictions.rationale: Recent high-profile cyber incidents and ongoing policy focus increase odds of a CYBER-tagged action.

predictions.text: The Cboe SKEW Index will close at or below 120.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a daily official close for SKEW <= 120.0 via Cboe historical data; any one trading day through 2025-11-30 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Equity breadth improvement and reduced tail-hedging demand
VVIX/VIX ratio trends
Dealer gamma positioning around large options expiries
predictions.rationale: Broadening equity rally and subdued demand for tail hedges can depress SKEW readings.

predictions.text: CME FedWatch Tool implied probability of a December 2025 25 bp rate cut will close below 45% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME FedWatch end-of-day snapshot (4:00–5:00 p.m. ET) for Dec 2025 meeting; probability for a 25 bp cut < 45% on any trading day through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Fedspeak indicating a higher bar for near-term cuts
Inflation prints (CPI/PPI/PCE) surprises vs consensus
Term premium moves and front-end yields
predictions.rationale: Cautious Fed rhetoric and sticky services inflation could pull market-implied odds lower temporarily.

predictions.text: On at least one U.S. date between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-01, FlightAware will report at least 25,000 total delays within/into/out of the United States.
predictions.verification_criteria: FlightAware daily 'Delays' totals for the United States tally >= 25,000 on any date in the window; verify via FlightAware daily stats page or archived snapshots.
monitoring_signals: TSA throughput records around Thanksgiving
NOAA storm systems impacting major hubs (NE/Midwest/West Coast)
Airline crew/ATC staffing advisories
predictions.rationale: Thanksgiving peak travel and seasonal weather typically drive elevated delays even in benign operational years.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, a U.S. hyperscaler (Amazon, Microsoft, Google, or Meta) will announce a new U.S. renewable energy PPA of at least 600 MW nameplate capacity.
predictions.verification_criteria: Company press release or official blog post naming counterparty and U.S. project(s) totaling >=600 MW under a new PPA announced by 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: Utility IRP filings citing large data center load
Developer announcements (NextEra, Invenergy, AES, Ørsted) hinting at large offtakes
State PUC dockets on data center-driven interconnections
predictions.rationale: Soaring AI/data center load is accelerating large-scale PPAs; year-end often clusters announcements.
